sentences.en: a swashbuckling tale of adventure on the high seas
sentences.cn: 公海上的传奇历险故事

sentences.en: Adventure is the salt of life to some men.
sentences.cn: 对有些男子而言,冒险是生活的乐趣.

sentences.en: Adventure is the salt of life to some people.
sentences.cn: 冒险对某些人来说是生活中的刺激.

sentences.en: Come on – where’s your sense of adventure?
sentences.cn: 来吧——你的冒险精神哪里去了？

sentences.en: Don't give me any of that jazz about your great adventure!
sentences.cn: 别再向我胡吹你那了不起的奇遇吧!

sentences.en: From now on, I'm gonna say yes--yes to love, yes to adventure, yes to life, whatever it maybe, the answer's going to be yes.
sentences.cn: 从今天起，我要积极接受一切，接受爱，迎接挑战，拥抱生活，不管什么事，我都会勇敢地去接受。

sentences.en: He has adventure in his blood.
He recounted and adorned his adventure.
sentences.cn: 他叙述了他那不寻常的经历,多少有点渲染.

sentences.en: He was none the worse for his adventure.
sentences.cn: 他经历这件惊险事倒没受到伤害.

sentences.en: His early training predisposed him to a life of adventure.
sentences.cn: 他早年所受的训练使他易于接受冒险生活.

sentences.en: Huck described his entire adventure on Cardiff Hill.
sentences.cn: 哈克描述了他在加第夫山上的整个历险经过.

sentences.en: The adventure changed the whole current of his life.
sentences.cn: 那场奇遇改变了他人生的方向.

sentences.en: the pure escapism of adventure movies
The trip to Afghanistan was an adventure for Helen.
sentences.cn: 到阿富汗旅行对海伦来说是一次冒险的经历.

sentences.en: They were being pitched into a new adventure.
sentences.cn: 他们正被抛入一场新的冒险。

sentences.en: They'rewritten as adventure stories. They're not intended to be deep.
sentences.cn: 它们是作为历险故事来写的，并没打算追求深刻。
